string-array.name: game_time_tips
string-array.item: You play games all night while everyone else is sleeping
You have to play a game in the morning to refresh yourself
To eat or to play a game; that is the question
You have to play a game in the afternoon to refresh yourself
"A hard day's work means you've earned a night of gaming!"
"You're still gaming intensively late at night. Take care of your body while entertaining yourself"
